ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: ursodiol tablets , 250 mg 500 mg indicated treatment patients primary biliary cholangitis ( pbc ) .
contraindications: recommended adult : 13-15 mg/kg/day administered two four divided doses food . ( 2.1 ) scored ursodiol tablets , 500 mg : scored tablet broken halves provide recommended . ( 2.3 , 16 )
adverseReactions: patients complete biliary obstruction known hypersensitivity intolerance ursodiol components formulation .
indications_original: Ursodiol tablets, 250 mg and 500 mg are indicated for the treatment of patients with primary biliary cholangitis (PBC).
contraindications_original: Recommended adult dosage: 13-15 mg/kg/day administered in two to four divided doses with food. (2.1) Scored ursodiol tablets, 500 mg: scored tablet can be broken in halves to provide recommended dosage. (2.3, 16)
adverseReactions_original: Patients with complete biliary obstruction and known hypersensitivity or intolerance to ursodiol or any of the components of the formulation.
